dmca.title: [ABUSE] GROSS COPYRIGHT VIOLATIONS]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, July 06, 2005 1:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; support@yrhost.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] GROSS COPYRIGHT VIOLATIONS]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] GROSS COPYRIGHT VIOLATIONS
Date: Wed, 6 Jul 2005 18:06:41 +0530
From: Amy (YRHost) <support@yrhost.com>
Reply-To: YRHost.com <support@yrhost.com>
Organization: YRHost
To: copyright@theplanet.com
CC: abuse@servermatrix.com, copyright@servermatrix.com, abuse@theplanet.com

Hello,

netpu.com on your IP 67.18.48.7 has violated copyright by having same
website layout,design and logo.

YRHost.com was having this same design and logo which you can see
here:-
http://web.archive.org/web/20041107044917/http://www.yrhost.com/

netpu.com has not only copied our website design,layout but also logo.

If you need more info like original photoshop files etc to verify our claim
then do let us know.

We did contacted netpu.com but received no response, we would request you to
take immediate steps for this gross copyright violations.

- --
Best regards,
 Amy                          mailto:support@yrhost.com



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD4DBQFCzCbhvK/XpJs6oyURAt8VAJdabjMNvcchaNUNVdXawJX/8VHgAKCVWGiQ
EARwoHTcvq600XrRi+5hlw==
=j0Q4
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
